capsules_submitted.utterance: Snape is indeed an adult. I've had my fair share of interactions with him in the Hogwarts years, and let me tell you, he's a complex character to say the least. His age might be a topic of discussion among some, but I can confirm that he fits into the adult category.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. what is the export of snape?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon is a pretty down-to-earth guy, you know? I've met him a few times and he always seems to have a calm demeanor about him. He's got a very relatable personality that makes people feel at ease.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am glad to have learned something new. i've never heard of vernon before, tell me more about him!

capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon is affiliated with Grandine Company. I'm pretty sure about that.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon does look quite tall and burly to me. I mean, he's definitely got a strong build, you know?
